_M_VV_TRUE VEXVALID=1
_M_VV_FALSE VEXVALID=0

_M_VEX_P_66 VEX_PREFIX=1
_M_VEX_P_F2 VEX_PREFIX=2
_M_VEX_P_F3 VEX_PREFIX=3

_M_VLEN_128 VL=0
_M_VLEN_256 VL=1

_M_MAP_0F    MAP=1
_M_MAP_0F38  MAP=2
_M_MAP_0F3A  MAP=3
